ModMetaData.name: Smart Odyssey
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
A lightweight mod that allows you to visualize the tile mutators of a selected tile in the world map, with custom icons for each mutator.
It also adds mod options to both individually and globally tweak mutator and landmark commonalities, so you can make a world that is as vanilla or as wacky as desired!
This mod is included in Alpha Biomes.
